Introduction
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
![](https://i.pinimg.com/originals/72/8c/c8/728cc80639a076e9af5b8d1cc60636b2.gif)


My name is Esther Kim and I am a native New Yorker, born and raised in Queens, NY. I have been in this beautiful city for 28 years. My career goals include becoming a health care professional that is able to combine my analytical skills and hard sciences training. Whether it is working in the pharmaceutical industry or the public health tech industry, I plan to use the evidence through data collected to develop solutions and method that improve the delivery of healthcare to all.
